~Johnny Depp

—Diane von Furstenberg

name: Warren
event_content: "Getting through a maze takes both intelligence and intuition - use both to find your way to the end."</br></br>Hey Guys!!</br></br>Interested in some mind boggling and tricky game!?</br></br>For all the maze aficionados out there, BRAHMA'23⚡ brings for you all a very mind bending and intricate Warren - Maze Game. So buckle up to solve a bunch of tricks to juggle your way out of the enigma.</br></br>Don't wait and hussle up!!</br></br>⚜️ Register at: min.lc/warren</br>⚜️ Registration fee: 200/- per team</br>📅 Date: 31 March,2023</br></br>Rules and Regulations</br>🔸A team of 2 members can participate.</br>🔸There will be a starting  and ending point. Each team has to enter the game from the starting point .</br>🔸The path once chosen by the team in the maze is fixed and there will be no provision of returning through the same path.</br>🔸Mobile Phones wont be permitted inside the maze</br>🔸The team to complete the exit with minimal time will be selected as the winners.</br>🔸Participants can be from Engineering colleges or Arts & Science colleges.</br></br>Grab a partner to run the maze! Show up and get out of it…. choose the right path and be the winner</br></br>For more queries, contact</br>Alan : 7034967829</br>Arjun : 9961423400</br></br>#brahma23</br>#asiet</br>#warren</br>#maze
